TopicTitle: Finally something that satellites could do? (Asteroid Tracking Rework Suggestion)

Articles.Content:
Well,

The Topic explains it mostly. We got in theory 1 tracking station on kerbal

The idea is to downscale the tracking ability of the tracking station and increase the chance to find asteroids with each launched satellite around kerbal. Maybe even with influence of the orbit altitude. So finally i would have a reason to shoot up satellites with a telescope part, as example, without using a mod that makes satellites a useful endeavor.

Why the suggestion? I still think stock satellites comes to short in KSP at the moment. And i like Satellites with a purpose instead of only deco in stock mode
Perhaps not the chance that asteroids are detected (I think it detects them all?), but increasing the range.

This was my exact plan to post about day ago..

That would be nice,

what about those simple things:

  • Lets decrease tracking station ability
  • Create new tracking part (parts) for satelite detector
    >>(range limited, maybe diferent range=diferent power consumption during activity)
  • When it is powered it detect/shows you possible asteroids when you control that craft
  • When it has also comunication device(antenas and Txs which we already have as a parts)+(and again also sufficiently powered) it transmits actual position to kerbin and provide tracking option in map view and tracking station

Not so much new requested, great gameplay options ahead with this.

This could bring to game:

  • Gain some sense to use "satelites"
    (which are really part of a space programs..)
  • Extends in-game-sense-value of electric items like battery and power sources
  • Creates new playground area

I feel ok with Kerbincentric asteroid detection (although during my last interplanetary mission Kerbin was looking like a haunted house with all those question marks around it which were nowhere else)

It might be good if asteroid detection was a feature unlocked at certain level in Career though.

How about with the tracking station, you can only detect asteroids that come within Kerbin's SOI, and then with satellites, you unlock better detectors progressively, so that the first one increases it a little bit, and then each upgrade increases it more and more.

It might be good if asteroid detection was a feature unlocked at certain level in Career though.
